ComicInfo.Series: Classic Monsters of Pre-Code Horror Comics: Mummies
ComicInfo.Summary:
Millionaire collector John Masterson comes into possession of king Tut’s Egyptian “demon coat”, a jacket which - once donned – scares its wearer to death with frightful visions. The killing coat passes from hand to hand until it’s finally destroyed.
"In the late nineteenth century, two french archeologists chanced upon a long-lost tomb deep in the Sahara desert..." The men find Queen Rami and her recipe for a will-controlling perfume. They mix a potion and go mad.
Two explorers discover an Egyptian sarcophagus and a surprise inside.
Egyptian mummy comes alive in a modern laboratory and runs amok.
The tomb is protected by the depiction of a half man- half beast. It comes alive and kills the professor.
The mummy of king Ramzu comes alive and wants only one thing: to be joined in death with his beloved Oaana. He abducts the mummy of his beloved queen, flees into the Egyptian jungle (?), fights off lions and a pesty police officer. In the end he finds his peace, witnessed by a girl reporter. "Can't print the story... who would believe me?".
"Little is known of the fabulous situation which existed many centuries ago in the foothills of the Andes mountains of south America..." Discovering a king's burial chambers, three explorers confront living mummies and one of the men is captured and made into another mummy.
In an american museum a mummy comes alive. Dramid cheated egyptian death-god Osiris for 5.500 years and walks the earth again. Police cannot stop him. A mysterious stranger comes to help, disrobes and reveals himself to be Osiris - claiming Dramid for the realm of the dead.
"Late in the nineteenth century, a strange death was recorded in the files of the London police..." British explorer is hit by mummy's curse for pillaging an Egyptian tomb.
Two American engineers discover ancient Egyptian tombs and get in a fight with living mummies. Resurrected queen Neferti helps them escape, because she didn’t wish to be resurrected in the first place.
Professor Hayes brings an Egyptian mummy back to life.
"A tale of supernatural wonder that comes down through the ages tells of two Egyptian lovers in the year 1543 B.C. ..." A princess loves a slave, which cannot be. The slave gets entombed but survives the ages in a state of supended animation. He finds his princess - as a mummy in the British Museum.
Professor Denton’s expedition explores the insides of an Azetec pyramid in Mexico. Expedition member Carlson is found raving mad, and then goes missing. Denton faces the attacking mummy of king Kataw. He barely manages to escape and seals the pyramid forever.
"In 1896, the discovery of a jeweled necklace by British archeologists in the tomb of an Egyptian princess, caused a stir of excitement throughout the world..." The necklace of death strangles anyone who wears it. Just that happens to a gangster's girl when he steals it from the museum.
"In a stronghold in the cellar of the London museum is a mummy case that is permanently sealed and secluded..." It stays closed because the mummy inside likes to attack museum guards who bear a resemblance to the mummy's murderer.
Woe be to him who deprives an ancient pharaoh of his mate! Only a live girl, shivering in terror, will placate the wrath still churning in the mouldering bones.
Archeologist Damon Knight excavates an ancient egypt tomb. He is warned by the ghost of the 8,000 years old mummy of Kali-Dahn not to desecrate his burial chamber. As Knight continues, he gets lured into the tomb and has to take the mummy's place.
ComicInfo.Title: The Demon Coat; True Tales of the Supernatural #41; Priestess of the Sphinx; Servants of the Tomb!; A-Tisket A-Casket; The Mummy's Curse!; A Hand of Fate Mystery #3; The Mummy; True Tales of Unexplained Mystery # 53; The Persevering Mummy; The Case of the Malignant Mummy; True Tales of the Supernatural #36; Vault of the Winged Spectres; The Mummy's Hand; The Unburied Mummy; True Tales of Unexplained Mystery #49; Death from the Tomb; The Living Mummies; Baffling Mysteries #24; True Tales of Unexplained Mystery #45; The Mummy's Bride; The Case of the Beckoning Mummy; The Mummy!
